
# LavenderTown — Roadmap

## Phase 0 — Foundations (Week 1–2)
- Repo setup & packaging
- Core Inspector class
- Pandas support
- Streamlit rendering shell

## Phase 1 — MVP (Week 3–5)
- Null detection & visualization
- Type inconsistency detection
- Basic outlier detection
- CSV upload UI
- Findings export (JSON/CSV)

## Phase 2 — Power Features (Week 6–9)
- Polars support
- Rule authoring UI
- Dataset comparison (drift)
- Performance optimizations
- Theme support

## Phase 3 — Ecosystem Integration (Week 10–14)
- Pandera rule export
- Great Expectations export
- CLI wrapper
- Streamlit Cloud demo app

## Phase 4 — Advanced Ghosts (Future)
- Time-series anomalies
- Cross-column logic
- ML-assisted anomaly detection
- Collaboration features

## Success Metrics
- <5 lines to usable dashboard
- Sub-2s load for 100k rows
- Clear ghost explanations

## Stretch Ideas
- VS Code extension
- Jupyter widget
- dbt integration
